name: Assign to Trello
description: Creates cards on a designated Trello board any time you're assigned an issue on GitHub.

TRELLO_BOARD_ID.description: In the URL for the board after `/b/`

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A [GitHub personal access token](https://github.com/settings/tokens/new) with `repo` or `public_repo` scope

TRELLO_PUBLIC_KEY.description: The Trello Developer API key. Run `bundle exec rake trello_token` to retrieve.

TRELLO_MEMBER_TOKEN.description: The Trello member token. Run `bundle exec rake trello_token` to retrieve.
